|cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, MicroSD Card slot, SIM Card slot, |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 12-24 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 20-pin header,, J4 |jtag = yes,, 6-pin header,, J3 |specialfeat = |flags = MU-MIMO, DFS, |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Compex WSB419 |rad1modif = SD (module) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Compex WSB419 |rad2modif = SD (module) |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''Get the latest Updates from Compex Systems - [http://eepurl.com/bXB9j5 Link]'' "C-BT-419EPW 7A01" is silkscreened on the main board. ===Product Key Features=== * Chipset: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (DK04: Dakota/Wasabi) * 2×2 On-board 2.4GHz radio (400Mbps physical data rate) * 2×2 On-board 5GHz radio (867Mbps physical data rate) * 2x U.FL connectors, diplexer allows dual band concurrent * 2x GbE Port, Dual Band (2.4/5GHz), 802.11ac Wave 2 * Supports Mini PCIe slot, Wi-Fi/LTE module, USB 3.0 Port * Supports MU-MIMO, 802.11n WLAN applications (2.4/5GHz) * Supports 20/40MHz at 2.4GHz and 20/40/80MHz at 5GHz * Frequency Range: 2.412~2.472 GHz, 5.180~5.825 GHz ===Specifications=== *Reference Design: DK04 *Product Type: Embedded Board *Chipset: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 WiSoC *System Memory: 256MB (supports up to 1GB) *Flash Memory: 32MB (NOR) *Interface: 2x GbE LAN (RJ45) ports with Auto MDI-X :1x Mini PCIe v2.0 slot (9.2mm height), uses USB 2.0 signals :1x Serial Port 4-Pin connector (UART) :1x Serial Port 6-Pin connector (High Speed UART) :1x JTAG 20-Pin connector, 1x USB 3.0 Port *LED Indicators: 1x Power, 2x LAN activity :Reset Button: 1x F/W Reset Button *Operating System: QCA Reference Firmware, OpenWrt v18.x *Dimension: 120 x 105 x 15 mm ===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/ Compex System Sample Store] ====Ordering Configuration==== 
Item Code		    Chipset	            Card Information
WPJ419 7A01	    IPQ4019 2x2 2.4/5GHz            Embedded Board
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/compex/compex_wpj419 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/compex/wpj419 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.6 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== :[[Compex]] • [https://www.compex.com.sg/embedded-board/ Embedded Boards] *[[Compex WSB419]] (DK04: Wasabi) *[[Compex WPJ419]] (DK04: Wasabi) *[[Compex WPJ428]] (DK03: Dakota) *[[Compex AP-DK01]] (DK01: Malibu) *[[Compex AP-DK03]] (DK03: Dakota) *[[Compex WPQ864]] *[[Compex WPQ865]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
